dict.acceptation: 实现；了解，意识到；（所担心的事）发生；以…价格卖出；

sent.orig: The verb in question is written variously realize and realise.
sent.trans: 我们正在讲的这个动词可以分别写成 realize和realise 两种形式。

sent.orig: Could versus signal passing programme came realize frequency de multiplication, could realize precise frequency synthesis output.
sent.trans: 可以对信号通过编程来实现分频，从而可以实现精确的频率合成输出。

sent.orig: Only then helps them to realize the value toable to realize the self-value.
sent.trans: 只有帮助他们实现价值才能实现自我价值。

sent.orig: Color realize static edit box and color box, and gives concrete steps to realize.
sent.trans: 实现彩色编辑框和彩色静态框，并给出了具体实现步骤。

sent.orig: Realize ECM generation adopting DES algorithm and realize EMM generationadopting RSA algorithm.
sent.trans: 分别采用DES 算法和RSA 算法，实现了条件接收系统授权控制消息和授权管理消息的生成。
